M2X.name: M2X
M2X.description: Tizen JavaScript library for AT&T M2X platform. This library will try to participate as a module if an AMD loader is available

params.name: options
params.description:
A object containing the following properties
key: M2X API key (String,required). Error will be thrown if key is not provided
forward_errors: (Boolean).If true, errors will be forwarded to the successful callback (if provided)
Example: var myM2X = new M2X({key:'yourm2xkeygoeshere'}); Unless stated otherwise, all functions in this library are asynchronous and a callback function should be provided. Callback signature onSuccess(result) where result is an object with following attributes result.status = HTTP code returned by M2X API result.response = JSON encoded response. All functions accept an optional onError callback. Errors can be forwarded to the onSuccess callback by setting the 'forward_errors' attribute to true in the constructor

classitems.description: Retrieve the list of devices accessible by the authenticated API key that meet the search criteria.

classitems.description: Returns a date in ISO8601 format
classitems.name: getISO8601Timestamp

params.description: Either a Date instance or a number(integer)
